dataset_id: BOREAS TF-09 SSA-OBS Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Soil Temperature Data
title: BOREAS TF-09 SSA-OBS Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Soil Temperature Data
summary: Soil temperature and heat flux data from the SSA-OBS site, collected by the TF-09 group; and the flux and ancillary data collected at the SSA-OBS tower flux site by the TF-09 group.

cmr.title: BOREAS TF-09 SSA-OBS Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Soil Temperature Data
